text: Maudi Bhakesh Chanda is a former Member of the 1st National Assembly of Pakistan as a representative of East Pakistan. The assembly was in place between 1947 and 1954. Chanda has withdrawn from the 1947 Constituent Assembly of India following the partition of India. ==References== Category:Pakistani MNAs 1947–1954 Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Maudi Bhakesh Chanda
